languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте представить вам дочь канцлера Клеменции Версериан и мою правнучку, Астарцию". {n}Сенешаль с достоинством и затаенной гордостью смотрит на девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша милость, позвольте представить вам дочь канцлера Клеменции Версериан и мою правнучку, Астарцию". {n}Сенешаль с достоинством и затаенной гордостью смотрит на девушку.{/n}

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте представить вам дочь канцлера Клеменции Версериан и мою правнучку, Астарцию". {n}Сенешаль с достоинством и затаенной гордостью смотрит на девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks at the young woman with dignity and concealed pride.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、この娘はクレメンティア・ウェルザリアン議長の娘にして私のひ孫、アスタルチアにございます」{n}アベラルドは誇りに思う気持ちをあまり隠さず、毅然と若い女性を見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、この娘はクレメンティア・ウェルザリアン議長の娘にして私のひ孫、アスタルチアにございます」{n}アベラルドは誇りに思う気持ちをあまり隠さず、毅然と若い女性を見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: “大人，请允许我向您介绍克莱门缇雅·韦尔森宰相的女儿，也是我的曾孙女，艾丝塔西娅。”{n}阿贝拉德严肃地注视着这位年轻的女士，难以掩饰脸上的骄傲。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，请允许我向您介绍克莱门缇雅·韦尔森宰相的女儿，也是我的曾孙女，艾丝塔西娅。”{n}阿贝拉德严肃地注视着这位年轻的女士，难以掩饰脸上的骄傲。{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítame presentarle a la hija de la canciller Clementia Werserian y mi bisnieta: Astartia». {n}Abelard apenas intenta ocultar su orgullo al mirar solemnemente a la joven.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, permítame presentarle a la hija de la canciller Clementia Werserian y mi bisnieta: Astartia». {n}Abelard apenas intenta ocultar su orgullo al mirar solemnemente a la joven.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, permettez-moi de vous présenter la fille de la chancelière Clémentia Werserian et mon arrière-petite-fille, Astartia. » {n}Abélard pose un regard solennel et empli de fierté sur la jeune femme qui l'accompagne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, permettez-moi de vous présenter la fille de la chancelière Clémentia Werserian et mon arrière-petite-fille, Astartia. » {n}Abélard pose un regard solennel et empli de fierté sur la jeune femme qui l'accompagne.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wenn ich vorstellen darf: Astartia, die Tochter von Kanzlerin Clementia Werserian und meine Urenkelin." {n}Abelards ernster Blick ruht mit kaum verhohlenem Stolz auf der jungen Frau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wenn ich vorstellen darf: Astartia, die Tochter von Kanzlerin Clementia Werserian und meine Urenkelin." {n}Abelards ernster Blick ruht mit kaum verhohlenem Stolz auf der jungen Frau.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi torunum Şansölye Clementia Werserian'ın kızı Astartia ile tanıştırayım." {n}Abelard, genç kadına ağırbaşlılıkla bakarken gururunu da pek saklamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, allow me to introduce the daughter of Chancellor Clementia Werserian and my great-granddaughter, Astartia." {n}Abelard looks solemnly upon the young woman with barely concealed pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi torunum Şansölye Clementia Werserian'ın kızı Astartia ile tanıştırayım." {n}Abelard, genç kadına ağırbaşlılıkla bakarken gururunu da pek saklamıyor.{/n}
